channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AI is shaking up the moving industry — here's how
Autopsy reveals cause of death for Brazilian tourist who fell into volcano
Admitting defeat? Why Hamas officials say the terror group 'lost control' of Gaza
Crisis in the copper chain: innovation, geopolitics and Australia’s role
Citi lifts Nvidia's price target on booming sovereign AI demand
Man accused of beheading father and posting video of his severed head to stand trial
item.description: A Pennsylvania man accused of killing his father and posting a video of his severed head online faces trial Monday in the Philadelphia suburbs

item.title: What to know about the flash floods in Texas that killed more than 80 people
item.description: Flash floods in Texas have killed at more than 80 people, many of them children

item.title: Flooding from Chantal's remnants forces dozens to flee homes in North Carolina
item.description: Officials in North Carolina say heavy rain and flooding from the remnants of Tropical Storm Chantal forced dozens of people to flee their homes

item.title: Risk of further floods in Texas during desperate search for missing as death toll tops 80
item.description: The risk of life-threatening flooding is still high in central Texas with more rain on the way

item.title: 3 dead, 10 injured in South Philadelphia shooting; person is in custody, police say
item.description: Authorities say three people were killed and 10 others injured in a shooting
